markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Derring-do](/Feats.aspx?ID=6163) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 167 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

When you compound panache with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out. When you already have panache, you can roll twice and use the higher result on checks to which the circumstance bonus from stylish combatant applies ([Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=2370) and any skill actions with the [bravado](/Traits.aspx?ID=801) trait).
name: Derring-do
